refnamediv.refpurpose: Show the value in a given p-field.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Show the value in a given p-field.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.para: This function works at i-rate and k-rate.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: x -- the number of the p-field.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: The value returned by the p function is the value in a p-field.

refsect1.title: Examples
refsect1.para:
Here is an example of the p opcode. It uses the file p.csd.
Example of the p opcode.
See the sections Real-time Audio and Command Line Flags for more information on using command line flags.
Its output should include lines like:
instr 1: i1 = 50.375
